import React from 'react' import { NavDropdown, NavLink, Row, Col, Image, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' export function CartDropdown() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const { cartItems } = cart return ( <>
{cartItems.map(item => (

{item.name}

${item.price}

 ))}
) }
